results.title: Safety and otoprotection of metformin in radiation-induced sensorineural hearing loss in the guinea pig.
results.text_hl: The objective of this study was to determine the safety and radioprotective properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ against radiation-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cochlear_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015834 @@@cochlear damage@@@ both in vitro and in vivo.

citations.NLM: Mujica-Mota MA, Salehi P, Devic S, Daniel SJ. Safety and otoprotection of metformin in radiation-induced sensorineural hearing loss in the guinea pig. Otolaryngol Head Neck Surg. 2014 May;150(5):859-65. PMID: 24500877
